List of GlueX talks

Accessing glue through photoproduction measurements at GlueX , HADRON 2021, Virtual, July 26 - August, 2021 (Peter Pauli)

  • GlueXperiment
  • gluexexperiment
  • Glue_X

GlueX is a particle physics experiment located at Jefferson Lab in Newport News, VA. Its primary goal is to search for and study exotic hybrid mesons.
